review_items.en_definition: to deliberately avoid or abstain from
review_items.example_en: They eschew sugar during training season.
review_items.example_zh: 訓練季他們會刻意避開糖分。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: His fatuous remark derailed the discussion.
review_items.example_zh: 他愚蠢的一句話讓討論走偏。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: A lachrymose ballad played on repeat.
review_items.example_zh: 一首催淚的抒情歌反覆播放。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: Residents fulminated against the rezoning plan.
review_items.example_zh: 居民強烈抨擊重劃計畫。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: The ersatz leather peeled within weeks.
review_items.example_zh: 仿皮幾週內就開始剝落。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: Her perspicacious reading solved the puzzle.
review_items.example_zh: 她的敏銳解讀解開了難題。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: The garrulous host dominated the conversation.
review_items.example_zh: 多話的主持人幾乎壟斷了談話。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: No one could gainsay the clear evidence.
review_items.example_zh: 沒人能反駁那份明確的證據。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: looking or sounding dismal and gloomy
review_items.example_en: He spoke in a lugubrious, drawn-out tone.
review_items.example_zh: 他用陰鬱而拖長的語氣說話。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_zh: 冰川的退縮看來無可阻擋。
review_items.label: review

review_items.zh_explanation: 不致冒犯；撫慰的／無害的
review_items.example_en: The speech was anodyne and offended no one.
review_items.example_zh: 那場演說中庸無害，沒有冒犯任何人。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: Her quixotic project ignored all constraints.
review_items.example_zh: 她那理想化的專案無視所有限制。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: It would be churlish to refuse their help now.
review_items.example_zh: 此刻拒絕他們的幫忙會顯得無禮。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: He felt bilious after the turbulent flight.
review_items.example_zh: 顛簸的航班讓他噁心難受。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: He was complaisant toward his influential client.
review_items.example_zh: 他對那位有影響力的客戶十分順從。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: An obstreperous crowd ignored the barriers.
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: A recondite theorem puzzled the class.
review_items.example_zh: 艱澀的定理讓全班困惑。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: He remained obdurate despite strong evidence.
review_items.example_zh: 即便證據明確，他依舊頑固不改。
review_items.label: review
